meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Norris Scott Krzywonos Laura McLean Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7709.

div.div: First regular-play game to end in a Tiebreaker Round.

td.p: Sarah Norris, a technical writer and manager from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Scott Krzywonos, an editor from Levittown, Pennsylvania
Laura McLean, a data analyst from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,799)

tr.td: THAT'S ABOUT THE SIZE OF IT
FOOD FRANCHISES
HISTORIC TRIOS
MAILING IT IN
(Alex: All about stuff you can actually mail as-is if you put an address on it and a stamp.)
ERIN
GO "BRA"

Scott
Sarah

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Laura] The correct response is, "What are [*]?" Guernsey, Jersey and those.)
ScottWhat are the Canary Islands?
$3,995
SarahWhat are the Faroe Islands
$4,801
LauraWhat the Shetland Islands
$8,201
the Channel Islands')

5 W
(including 3 DDs)
